article_title: Man wounded in shooting outside Lakewood restaurant – The Denver Post
article_text:
A man was wounded in a shooting outside a Lakewood restaurant and bar Sunday night.

The incident occurred outside Hart’s Corner Bar & Restaurant at West Mississippi Avenue and South Sheridan Boulevard at about 9 p.m.

By the time police arrived, the victim had been taken in a private car to a hospital, said Lakewood police spokesman Steve Davis.

The extent of his injuries was not immediately known.

The cause of the shooting was under investigation at 10 p.m., and police did not yet have a description of a suspect, Davis said.
